thread.section_title: ShopTo.Net Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.shopto.net
thread.title: Stuart Dainty

author: Stuart Dainty
title: Stuart Dainty
text:
I pre ordered mass effect andromeda and it could not have been simpler !
I added it to my basket as a pre order and waited. No money or deposit was taken until the day came for shipping.
I was notified by email that my money would be taken and the game dispatched. It arrived a day early so that was an even bigger plus. Have used shopto before and will do so again, had no trouble what so ever !
